Title: Silverlight for Umbraco Media Objects (SUMO)
Description: SUMO is a Silverlight 4 and WCF media manager for Umbraco, which currently allows bulk image uploading and basic image editing capabilities (cropping and rotating).
HomeWiki:
SUMO is a Silverlight 4 and WCF media manager for Umbraco, which currently allows bulk image uploading and basic image editing capabilities (cropping and rotating).

Community Tech Preview launched!

10th June 2010
We are extremely pleased to announce the Community Tech Preview (CTP) of Project SUMO, launched in conjunction with Microsoft and The CogWorks, Umbraco Certified Solutions Provider.
Current featureset of the CTP:
  • Bulk image uploading;
  • Basic image manipulation capabilities (rotate, flip & crop).

Current limitations of the CTP:
  • No drag/drop support;
  • Cannot delete images.

Other features considered for future releases are as follows:
  • Multiple Umbraco instance management;
  • Out-of-browser support and "offline" mode;
  • Support for Windows Phone 7.
